system.description: Connection - Prismatic Laser. For the rest of the user's Activation, Prismatic Laser gains [4-Strike], loses [Exhaust] and [Smite], has its Power reduced by 110, has its Accuracy reduced by 25, has its PP Cost reduced by 4, and has its Action Type changed to Simple Action. Passive: the user gains the Perforate and Radiance Abilities. When the user deactivates its Ultra Burst and changes Formes, this Ability is replaced with Prism Armor.
